title: "AI is increasingly being used to identify emotions – here’s what’s at stake"
excerpt: "Emotion recognition technology (ERT) is in fact a burgeoning multi-billion-dollar industry that aims to use AI to detect emotions from facial expressions. Yet the science behind emotion recognition systems is controversial: there are biases built into the systems."
